title: Real Hummus Recipe
description: This classic hummus recipe is easy to make by blending chickpeas, garlic, tahini, and lemon for a wonderful homemade snack or appetizer.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Appetizers and Snacks Dips and Spreads Recipes Hummus Recipes Real Hummus 4.6 (1,206) 929 Reviews 105 Photos This classic hummus recipe combines chickpeas, garlic, tahini, and lemon juice in a blender to make a delicious smooth and creamy dip, perfect for serving with warm pita bread or veggies for dipping. This recipe has been passed down for many generations. Submitted by ROYHOBBS Updated on January 28, 2025 Tested by Allrecipes Test Kitchen Tested by Allrecipes Test Kitchen The Allrecipes Test Kitchen staff are a team of culinary pros who make and vet recipes using only equipment you'd find in a home kitchen. Staff credentials vary but include training at the Culinary Institute of America; kitchen stints in fine dining restaurants; and countless hours in the test kitchen itself. Meet the Allrecipes Test Kitchen Save Rate Print Share Add Photo 105 105 105 105 Prep Time: 15 mins Total Time: 15 mins Servings: 20 Yield: 2 1/2 cups Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 20 servings 2 cloves garlic 1 (19 ounce) can chickpeas, half the liquid reserved 4 tablespoons lemon juice 2 tablespoons tahini 1 teaspoon salt, or to taste 2 tablespoons olive oil black pepper to taste Directions Chop garlic in a blender. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Pour chickpeas into the blender, reserving about 1 tablespoon for garnish. Add reserved liquid, lemon juice, tahini, and salt to taste; blend until creamy and well mixed. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Transfer mixture to a medium serving bowl. Drizzle olive oil and sprinkle pepper over the top. Garnish with reserved chickpeas. DOTDASH MEREDITH FOOD STUDIOS  I Made It Print 1,701 home cooks made it! Nutrition Facts (per serving) 54 Calories 3g Fat 7g Carbs 2g Protein Show Full Nutrition Label Hide Full Nutrition Label Nutrition Facts Servings Per Recipe 20 Calories 54 % Daily Value * Total Fat 3g 3% Saturated Fat 0g 2% Sodium 199mg 9% Total Carbohydrate 7g 2% Dietary Fiber 1g 5% Total Sugars 0g Protein 2g 3% Vitamin C 3mg 3% Calcium 16mg 1% Iron 1mg 3% Potassium 58mg 1% * Percent Daily Values are based on a 2,000 calorie diet. Your daily values may be higher or lower depending on your calorie needs. ** Nutrient information is not available for all ingredients. Amount is based on available nutrient data. (-) Information is not currently available for this nutrient. If you are following a medically restrictive diet, please consult your doctor or registered dietitian before preparing this recipe for personal consumption. Add Your Photo Photos of Real Hummus 01 of 105 Photo by  DOTDASH MEREDITH FOOD STUDIOS  02 of 105 Photo by  BeverlysKitchen 06/23/2023 Absolutely delicious. I made one mistake in adding the olive oil during processing, but it didn't have an adverse effect on the end result, or the taste. I intend to make this again soon. 03 of 105 Photo by  Sarah Ruthven 01/25/2022 Love making hummus! I make double and then freeze half - great for lunches, salads and snacking 04 of 105 Photo by  Dave Fotsch 03/24/2021 05 of 105 Photo by  sara 02/06/2021 06 of 105 Photo by  candicesg 01/17/2021 07 of 105 Photo by  Liz 12/08/2020 08 of 105 Photo by  mousesmom 08/20/2020 09 of 105 Photo by  Stephinator Fortyfive 07/29/2020 I added artichoke heart to mine. It gave it such a wonderful flavor! I need to make more. I used 2 cans chickpeas, 3 gloves garlic, juice from one lemon, cumin, paprika, green onion, chives and tahini. 10 of 105 Photo by  blaine 07/20/2020 1 2 3 4 5 Next You’ll Also Love Hummus III 2,286 Ratings Spiced Sweet Roasted Red Pepper Hummus 733 Ratings Extra Easy Hummus 672 Ratings Easy Roasted Red Pepper Hummus 395 Ratings Basic Hummus 82 Ratings Hummus IV 42 Ratings Hummus I 63 Ratings Jalapeño Hummus 263 Ratings Authentic Kicked-Up Syrian Hummus 146 Ratings Easy Black Bean Hummus 29 Ratings Raw Hummus 75 Ratings Sweet Potato Hummus 35 Ratings Baba Ghanoush 469 Ratings EZ Restaurant-Style Hummus 5 Ratings Black Bean Hummus 738 Ratings Quick Black Bean Hummus 17 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family. name: ROYHOBBS
instructions: Chop garlic in a blender. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios;Pour chickpeas into the blender, reserving about 1 tablespoon for garnish. Add reserved liquid, lemon juice, tahini, and salt to taste; blend until creamy and well mixed. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios;Transfer mixture to a medium serving bowl. Drizzle olive oil and sprinkle pepper over the top. Garnish with reserved chickpeas. DOTDASH MEREDITH FOOD STUDIOS
